title: Bug 14197: Removing a working set immediately applies changes
description: Bug 14197: Removing a working set immediately applies changes
OB: Currently, when a working set is removed, the package view in the background refilters. Additionally, all changes made to working sets are not canceled when pressing the 'cancel' button. The removal of the working set is not canceled.
EB: When removing a working set, the package view should not refilter immediately. It should only refilter when the working set selection dialog is closed. Furthermore, pressing 'cancel' should cancel all changes made to working sets.
